entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Snow level 2000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border early in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
